thread.title: Cheryl enjoys date night with husband Jean-Bernard at Ant and Dec's 40th birthday party
thread.title_full: Cheryl enjoys date night with husband Jean-Bernard at Ant and Dec's 40th birthday party

title: Cheryl enjoys date night with husband Jean-Bernard at Ant and Dec's 40th birthday party
text:
Cheryl enjoys date night with husband Jean-Bernard at Ant and Dec's 40th birthday party Cheryl enjoys date night with husband Jean-Bernard at Ant and Dec's 40th birthday party 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Cheryl Fernandez-Versini and her husband Jean-Bernard were among the starry guests at Ant and Dec’s joint 40th bash in London. 
The Geordie duo threw a huge party to celebrate their milestone before they fly off to Australia to start filming the new series of I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! next month. Cheryl Fernandez-Versini and her husband Jean-Bernard (Beretta/Sims/Rex) 
Cheryl and her husband are rarely seen in public together, but they put on a happy display as they entered Kensington Roof Gardens. 
JB kept a protective arm around his wife – and chivalrously carried the presents – as she flashed her legs in a thigh-high split dress. Amanda Holden (Beretta/Sims/Rex) 
Also joining the party were Britain’s Got Talent judges Amanda Holden, David Walliams and Alesha Dixon. 
Alesha used Twitter to give fans a sneak peek of her outfit before she arrived. 
— Alesha Dixon (@AleshaOfficial) October 15, 2015 
A cohort of ITV morning TV stars turned up to celebrate, including This Morning’s Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield, Eamonn Holmes and wife Ruth Langsford, and newly announced Good Morning Britain host Piers Morgan. 
Vernon Kay was flying solo without wife Tess Daly, but there were plenty of friends to cheer him up, including Jimmy Carr, Keith Lemon creator Leigh Francis and Paddy McGuinness. Fearne Cotton and Jesse Wood (Beretta/Sims/Rex) 
Fearne Cotton stunned in a lacy mini-dress just one month after giving birth to daughter Honey as she arrived with husband Jesse Wood. 
She later shared a snap of her and pal Davina McCall to celebrate the ex-Big Brother host’s own 48th birthday. Happy birthday to my amazing friend, the Angel woman that is @ThisisDavina ❤️ pic.twitter.com/2I6BFvcyNC 
— fearne cotton (@Fearnecotton) October 16, 2015 
Eighties hitmakers Black Lace turned up to party, apparently performing a special set for their fellow guests featuring classics Agadoo, Superman and Do The Conga. 
The night obviously ended well as Ant McPartlin’s wife Lisa Armstrong ditched her heels as she left the venue with her husband of nine years, while Declan Donnelly was led out by the hand by wife Ali Astall, who he married in August. Ant McPartlin with his wife Lisa (Rex) 
Dec hit the milestone on September 25, but Ant will have to wait until November 18 to turn the big 4-0. Declan Donnelly with wife Ali (Rex) 
The two birthday boys looked a little different from the throwback snap that pal Piers posted. At @antanddec 40th birthday party. What the **** happened to these sweet little lads… pic.twitter.com/xPEOCt6zcR Share article 
— Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) October 15, 2015 Promoted Stories
